page.title: Welcome To Odyssey Of the Stars
page.p: You are holding the in game manual that informs you what is diffrent from Vanilla Minecraft and how I think it's best to learn the mods in this pack.

page.title: Differences from Vanilla
page.p: To give you time to learn the pack, there will be no monsters spawning on the surface at night near spawn.

Punching trees will not give you a log. Instead you will gain only one plank, sawdust and bark. You will need to craft an Axe to harvest Logs. Use an Axe in the crafting grid to cut a log into three planks.
You can use the sawdust, and bark to cook things.
Eating the same thing over and over will give you fewer and fewer hunger restored each time. Luckly there is a lot more food items added. you will need a large farm to grow all of the crops.
If you are really desperate for food, I'm sure you can dig up something to eat.
The furnace doesn't get hot enough to make charcoal from logs. Starting out you should make a Charcoal Pit. Let that cook up so you can make plenty of torches.
